message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product.
